title: Louv 2008 Last Child in the Woods

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Louv makes to develop his argument about the separation between people and nature.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Louv makes to develop his argument about the separation between people and nature.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
